name: 洪媽益
objective: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
schedule:
September 14 Course Orientation
September 21 Positive Energy
September 28 Department Matters
October 5 Taipei Tech History
October 12 Communication Strategies
October 19 Time Management
October 26 Money Matters
November 2 Psychological Well-Being
November 9 MID-TERMS WEEK
November 16 Gender Equality
November 23 Writing Skills
November 30 Interpersonal Relationships
December 7 Library Resources
December 14 Exchange Student Application
December 21 Overseas Exchange
December 28 Teacher Training and Visit to Red Building (Historical Hall)
January 4 Invited Talk
January 11 Reports due
END
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Discussion Participation 10%
Weekly Reflections 50% (invited talks, in bold)
Final project (精采大學讀書計畫) 30%
精采大學讀書計畫
無論是校園生活、專業領域、社團活動、校外參與、感情生活、人生方向等，都可納入思考及規劃。透過精彩讀大學計畫書的撰寫，讓自己對未來大學四年充滿期待與規劃之餘，也試著去探索讓大學生涯更豐富更有意義的方式。(呈現方式不拘: 簡報、文字、影片、圖片……)
END
materials:
合院演講心得報告
格式範本請參閱: 通識中心首頁大學入門網站檔案下載心得單範本
